PLEASE_CLICK_THE_KEY_ICON_BELOW: Please click the key icon below
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_NORMAL_TEXT: Message will be sent as a normal text
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_SINGLE_MEDIA_FILE_CAPT: Message will be sent as a single media file with caption
TEXT_MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_MEDIA_GA: A text message will be sent followed by a media gallery
WHICH_MESSAGE_TEMPLATES_WANT_SEND: Which message templates do you want to send?
SEND_ALL_SELECTED_MESSAGE_TEMPLATES_CONT: Send all the selected message templates to each contact
SEND_RANDOM_MESSAGE_TEMPLATE_CONTACT: Send a random message template to each contact
CONTACTS_WANT_INCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which contacts do you want to include in this broadcast?
CONTACTS_WANT_EXCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which contacts do you want to exclude from this broadcast?
GROUPS_WANT_INCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which groups do you want to include in this broadcast?
GROUPS_WANT_EXCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which groups do you want to exclude from this broadcast?
TARGET_GROUP_MEMBERS_NOT_GROUP_ITSELF: Target the group members, not the group itself
BE_CAREFUL_SPAMMING_NOT_RECOMMENDED: Be careful with this option, spamming is not recommended.
LABELS_WANT_INCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which labels do you want to include in this broadcast?
LABELS_WANT_EXCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which labels do you want to exclude from this broadcast?
THIS_INCLUDES_LABELED_CONTACTS_CHATS_GRO: This includes labeled contacts, chats and groups.
LISTS_WANT_INCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which lists do you want to include in this broadcast?
LISTS_WANT_EXCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which lists do you want to exclude from this broadcast?
TARGET_BROADCAST_LIST_MEMBERS_NOT_LIST_I: Target the broadcast list members, not the list itself
THIS_INCLUDES_NUMBERS_CONTACTS_CHATS: This includes numbers of contacts and chats.
COUNTRIES_WANT_INCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which countries do you want to include in this broadcast?
COUNTRIES_WANT_EXCLUDE_BROADCAST: Which countries do you want to exclude from this broadcast?
SET_RANDOM_INTERVAL_BETWEEN_EVERY_MESSAG: Set a random interval between every message
WHEN_DO_YOU_WANT_TO_START_THE_ACTION: When do you want to start the action?
SCHEDULE_BROADCASTING_FUTURE_DATE: Schedule broadcasting for a future date
SAVE_BROADCASTING_SETTINGS_FUTURE_USE: Only save the broadcasting settings for future use
LABEL_CONVERSATIONS_THAT_RECEIVE_BROADCA: Label conversations that receive this broadcast
LABELS_WANT_ASSIGN_CONVERSATIONS_RECEIVE: Which labels do you want to assign to conversations that receive this broadcast?
ARCHIVE_CONVERSATIONS_THAT_RECEIVE_BROAD: Archive conversations that receive this broadcast
BLOCK_CONVERSATIONS_THAT_RECEIVE_BROADCA: Block conversations that receive this broadcast
TRIGGER_WEBHOOKS_CONVERSATIONS_THAT_RECE: Trigger webhooks for conversations that receive this broadcast
WEBHOOKS_WANT_TRIGGER_CONVERSATIONS_RECE: Which webhooks do you want to trigger for conversations that receive this broadcast?
ALLOW_SEND_PERSONAL_CHATS: Allow to send in personal chats
QUOTE_SENDERS_MESSAGE_WITH_REPLY: Quote sender's message with the reply
DONT_SEND_IF_CONVERSATION_OPEN: Don't send if the conversation is open
SEND_IF_MESSAGE_CONTAINS_SPECIFIC_KEYWOR: Send if message contains specific keywords
SEND_IF_EXACT_KEYWORD_MATCHED: Send only if the whole message matched a keyword
WHICH_TYPES_WANT_DETECT: Which types do you want to detect?
SEND_ONE_TIME_PER_CONTACT: Send only one time per contact
REPLY_REACTIONS_IF_CONDITIONS_MET: Reply Reactions if Conditions are Met
THIS_OPTION_SENDS_REPLY_BY_DEFAULT_EACH_: This option sends this reply by default to each contact who texts you
WHICH_GROUPS_ALLOWED_RECEIVE_REPLY: Which groups are allowed to receive the reply?
HOW_MANY_SECONDS_WAIT_BEFORE_REPLYING: How many seconds to wait before replying?
WHICH_KEYWORDS_SHOULD_BE_REPLIED_TO: Which keywords should be replied to?
ON_WHICH_DAYS_THIS_REPLY_CAN_WORK: On which days this reply can work?
WHICH_DATA_WANT_COLLECT_FROM_SENDER: Which data do you want to collect from sender?
WHICH_LABELS_WANT_ASSIGN_TO_CHAT: Which labels do you want to assign to the chat?
WHICH_WEBHOOKS_WANT_PROCESS: To which Webhooks do you want to process?
SEND_IF_NEW_CALL_RECEIVED: Send if a new call is received
SELECT_THE_INFORMATION_YOU_WANT_TO_EXPOR: Select the information you want to export
ALL_CONTACTS_NUMBERS_WHO_CHATTED_WITH_ME: All contacts numbers who chatted with me
ALL_UNSAVED_NUMBERS_WHO_CHATTED_WITH_ME: All unsaved numbers who chatted with me
ONLY_SELECTED_LABELED_CHATS_AND_CONTACTS: Only selected labeled chats and contacts
USE_IT_TO_SEND_WHATSAPP_MESSAGES_FROM_OU: Use it to send WhastApp messages from an out source.
USE_IT_TO_SEND_WHATSAPP_MESSAGES_TO_EXTE: Use it to send WhastApp messages to an external target.
TYPE_AT_TO_LIST_ALL_AVAILABLE_VARIABLES: type @ to list all the available variables
LIST_OF_AVAILABLE_FUNCTIONS_FOR_THIS_WEB: List of current available functions for this webhook
LIST_OF_AVAILABLE_PARAMETERS_ACCORDING_A: List of available parameters according to the action that triggers the webhook
GROUP_NAME_WHERE_THE_MESSAGE_IS_RECEIVED: group name where the message is received
GROUP_UNIQUE_ID_WHERE_THE_MESSAGE_IS_REC: group unique ID where the message is received
TEMPLATE_UNIQUE_ID_THAT_HAS_BEEN_SENT: template unique ID that has been sent
MESSAGE_UNIQUE_ID_THAT_HAS_BEEN_SENT: message unique ID that has been sent
PLEASE_WAIT_UNTIL_WHATSAPP_WEB_FINISHES_: Please wait until WhatsApp Web finishes loading
PLEASE_MAKE_SURE_LOGGED_IN_GOOGLE_ACCOUN: Please make sure to login to your Google account in Chrome
ADD_NEW_BUTTONS_WITH_ADDITIONAL_FUNCTION: Add new buttons with additional functions
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_INTERACTIVE_BUTTONS_LI: Message will be sent as an interactive buttons list
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_VCARD: Message will be sent followed by a vCard item
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_MULTIPLE_VCAR: Message will be sent followed by multiple vCard items
UNDERSTAND_ACCEPT_TERMS: I understand, and accept to use at my own risk
TERMS_TEXT: Make sure not to spam people with messages they don't wish to receive, by mis-using this function you might get your WhatsApp account permanently banned.
IMPORT_SHEET_TEXT: To import targets from a CSV or Excel sheet, make sure that the first column has the phone numbers. Numbers that don't have a valid WhatsApp account will be ignored. To use columns data in your message, use the ${COLUMN NUMBER} syntax in your template. Example: ${3} prints the content of the third column in your sheet.
TIDY_CONVERSATIONS_INSIDE_FILTERABLE_CUS: Tidy conversations inside filterable custom folders
SELECT_DATA_TO_IMPORT: Select the data that you want to import
MIGRATION_NOTE_1: Only import backup files that belong to this number
MIGRATION_NOTE_2: You have to enable your smart replies after the migration process is done
MIGRATION_NOTE_3: You have to reconfigure your webhooks after the migration process is done
TYPE_MINIMUM_CHARACTERS_SEARCH: Type a minimum of 3 characters to search
TEXT_MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_LOCATION: A text message will be sent followed by a location
FEATURE_UPGRADE_MESSAGE: Thank you for using WA Toolbox. Your current subscription plan does not include the feature that you're trying to use, please consider upgrading to a higher plan.
FIRST_COLUMN_MUST_BE_NUMBERS: The first column must has the phone numbers
TEXT_MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_FILE: A text message will be sent followed by an attached file
TEXT_MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_MULTIPLE: A text message will be sent followed by multiple attached files
SHOW_TEMPLATE_QUICK_REPLIES_LIST: Show this template in quick replies list
CHECK_UNCHECK_ENABLE_DISABLE_WEBHOOK: Check or uncheck to enable or disable the work of this webhook
WORKFLOW_UNIQUE_ID_THAT_TRIGGERED: workflow unique ID that has been triggered
SEND_MESSAGE_PRIVATELY_TO_USER: Send the message privately to the user
NOTE_USER_NOT_READ_MESSAGE_SEND_PRIVATE_: Please note that the user will not be able to read your messages in the selected groups after leaving them, consider sending the message to the user on private instead.
ON_WHICH_DAYS_THIS_WORKFLOW_CAN_WORK: On which days this workflow can work?
IF_CONDITION_MET: If the selected condition is met
MESSAGE_CONTAINS_KEYWORDS_RECEIVED: A message contains keywords is received
MESSAGE_CONTAINS_ATTACHMENTS_RECEIVED: A message contains attachments is received
SEND_EVENT_DATA_WEBHOOK: Send event data to a webhook
RUN_ON_CERTAIN_DATES: Run this workflow only on certain days
WHICH_LABELS_WANT_REMOVE_FROM_CHAT: Which labels do you want to remove from the chat?
TOUR_STEP_1: Welcome to WA Toolbox, please follow the short tutorial to start using it correctly.
TOUR_STEP_2: Start by creating your message templates, you will use them in your automation operations.
TOUR_STEP_3: Send immediate and scheduled broadcastings with your message templates.
TOUR_STEP_4: Setup your smart and automatic workflows here.
TOUR_STEP_5: Manage your subscription here, and keep an eye on our latest updates.
MESSAGE_TEMPLATES_SENT_FOLLOWING_TARGETS: message template(s) will be sent to the following targets
FOR_EACH_CONVERSATION_RECEIVE_BROADCAST: For each conversation that will receive this broadcast
CONVERSATION_USER_WILL_BLOCKED: The conversation user will be blocked
SUBSCRIBE_TO_UNLOCK_PREMIUM_FEATURES: Please subscribe to unlock the premium features. If you're already subscribed, insert your license key.
AFTER_SENDING_MESSAGES_DO_FOLLOWING: After sending messages to chats, do the following:
DOESNT_WORK_ON_BETA: This feature doesn't work on multiple-devices version of WhatsApp yet.
NUMBERS_ON_LIST_INTERNATIONAL_FORMAT: The numbers on my list are in international format
CHOOSE_IF_PREPENDED_COUNTRY_CODE: Choose this option if your numbers are correctly prepended with the country code
NUMBERS_ON_LIST_LOCAL_FORMAT: The numbers on my list are in local format
CHOOSE_IF_NEED_PREPEND: Choose this option if you need to prepend the country code to the numbers
LEADING_ZEROS_WILL_REMOVED_REPLACED: Leading zeros will be automatically removed and replaced by the country code.
USE_AS_KEYWORD_MATCH_ANY_INCOMING_MESSAG: Use * as a keyword to match any incoming message
SEND_MESSAGE_ANOTHER_CHAT: Send a message to another chat
RUN_WORKFLOW_ONLY_ONCE_PER_CHAT: Run this workflow only once per chat
RUN_DURING_CERTAIN_HOURS: Run this workflow during certain hours
DURING_WHICH_HOURS_WORKFLOW_WORK: During which hours this workflow can work?
RUN_WORKFLOW_ONLY_CERTAIN_CHATS: Run this workflow only for certain chats
FOR_WHICH_CHATS_WORKFLOW_CAN_WORK: For which chats this workflow can work?
OFFLINE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn off all scheduled broadcasts, workflows, webhooks and integrations.
ACCESS_LIMITED: Access limited. Maximum allowed users reached
AUTOMATICALLY_MENTION_ALL_GROUP_MEMEBERS: Automatically mention all group members in the message
SET_MEDIA_VIEW_ONCE: Set media to be viewed only once
ADD_USER_TO_GROUP: Add the user to a group
REMOVE_USER_FROM_GROUP: Remove the user from a group
TO_WHICH_GROUPS_YOU_WANT_ADD_USER: To which groups do you want to add the user?
FROM_WHICH_GROUPS_YOU_WANT_REMOVE_USER: From which groups do you want to remove the user?
NOTE_USER_MUST_BE_ON_CONTACT_LIST: Please note that the user must be on your contact list.
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_SELECTABLE_OPTIONS_LIS: Message will be sent as a selectable options list
FEATURE_ONLY_WORKS_WITH_VM: This feature only works with the Virtual Machine
FEATURE_ONLY_WORKS_WEB: This feature only works on the web version of WhatsApp
VM_NOTE_1: This is your virtual machine, it's your cloud-based instance of WhatsApp Web that will stay up and running while your browser is offline to keep your workflows running 24/7.
VM_NOTE_2: This is an experimental feature, it is available to you for testing purposes only until the end of September 2022.
YOU_DIDNT_SETUP_VM: You didn't set up any VM instances yet, please create one first.
FEATURE_ONLY_WORKS_WA_PERSONAL: This feature only works with WhatsApp personal (non-Business)
IMPORT_BACKUP_NOTE: The process will import your message templates, workflows and webhooks if your backup file contains them, it doesn't overwrite your old data.
WORKFLOW_SETTINGS_IGNORED_TRIGGERED: The workflow settings will be ignored and it will be triggered directly. Are you sure?
OPTION_ONLY_PERSONAL_CHATS: This option is only available for personal chats!
TYPE_DIRECT_LINK_IMAGE_GENERATION_API: Type the direct link of the image generation API, the above link must return a direct image file and not an HTML page to download the file. Example services:
NO_TARGETS_SELECTED_SELECT_ONE: No targets selected, please select at least one target.
SELECT_MESSAGE_TEMPLATE_SEND: Please select the message templates to send.
SELECT_FUTURE_DATE_TIME: Please select a future date and time.
FILL_REQUIRED_CONFIGS_CORRECTLY: Please fill in the required configurations correctly.
REVIEW_DISCLAIMER_ACCEPT_TERMS: Please review the disclaimer and accept the terms of use.
SAVE_CONTACT_NOTICE: To save the contact to your phone, make sure you install and setup WA Toolbox on your mobile
AUTOMATE_BUSINESS_INTEGRATE_HUNDREDS_APP: Automate your business and integrate with hundreds of apps.
AUTOMATE_BUSINESS_INTEGRATE_SALLA: Automate your business and integrate with Salla.
MESSAGE_SENT_MY_ACCOUNT: A message is sent from my account
USE_WEBHOOK_RESPONSE_AS_MESSAGE: Use the webhook response to send messages from workflows
WEBHOOK_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_NOTE: You can use the dot (.) character to access nested parameters, example:
RETURN_WEBHOOK_RESPONSE_SENDER: Return the webhooks responses to the sender
CONFIGURE_OPTION_IN_EACH_WEBHOOK_SETTING: Configure this option in each webhook's settings page
QUESTION: Question
AT_LEAST_ONE_REACTION_REQUIRED: At least one workflow reaction is required
ANSWER_SAME_USER_LANGUAGE: Answer in the same user language
RUN_WORKFLOW_CERTAIN_LABELS: Run this workflow only for certain labels
RUN_WORKFLOW_CERTAIN_COUNTRIES: Run this workflow only for certain countries
FOR_WHICH_LABELS_WORKFLOW_CAN_WORK: For which labels this workflow can work?
FOR_WHICH_COUNTRIES_WORKFLOW_CAN_WORK: For which countries this workflow can work?

MESSAGE_CONTAINS_KEYWORDS_SENT: A message contains keywords is sent
NEW_CART_ORDER_RECEIVED: A new cart order is received
MESSAGE_CONTAINS_LOCATION_RECEIVED: A message contains location is receive
NEW_FACEBOOK_AD_MEASSAGE_RECEIVED: A new Facebook Ad message received

AUTOMATE_BUSINESS_INTEGRATE_CHATGPT: Automate your chats with a trained ChatGPT agent.
ZOHO_INTEGRATION_DESCRIPTION: Integrate with the giant CRM software and sync contacts easily.
UNIQUE_ID_AD_POST_FB: The unique ID of your advertisement post, the one that comes after fb.me
PREVENT_CHATS_LIST_JUMPING: Prevent chats list jumping on message submission
FILE_LARGER_THAN_WHATSAPP_LIMIT: File is larger than the allowed WhatsApp limit
THERE_ARE_QUEUED_REQUESTS_PROCESS_THEM_N: There are [%X] queued incoming webhook requests in [%Y], do you want to process them now?
MAX_MESSAGES_DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of conversation messages to send to ChatGPT as a context (Higher numbers cause higher costs). Default is 10.
MAX_TOKENS_DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of tokens to spend for requests and responses (Higher numbers cause higher costs). Default is 800.
STOP_CHATGPT_REPLY_TO_USER: Stop ChatGPT from replying to this user
CHATGPT_SUPPORTED_TEXT_FORMATTING_DESCRI: Use \n to insert new lines. All WhatsApp message formatting symbols are supported.
THIS_FEATURE_IS_NATIVE: This feature is now a native feature in WhatsApp Web
STATUS_NOT_READY: Status is not ready for downloading yet, please try again later.
MISSING_RESELLER_CREDENTIALS_CONTACT_RES: Reseller AI credentials are missing. Please contact your reseller to set up this service.
TEXT_MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_FOLLOWED_PIX: A text message will be sent followed by a PIX message
TITLE: Title
MESSAGE_WILL_SENT_EVENT: Message will be sent as an event
FEATURE_DOESNT_WORK_GROUPS: This feature doesn't work in groups
ONLY_VERCEL_APP_WEBHOOK_URL_SUPPORTED: Only https://*.vercel.app/* webhook URLs are supported
MISSING_AI_CREDENTIALS: The AI credentials are missing. Please enter your API key in ChatGPTâ€™s settings, or contact your reseller to activate this service for you.
